trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of parameters relevant to an <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand"></xref> and their respective mappings to columns in a <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 表示相關參數集合<xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcCommand"></xref>它們中的資料行之個別對應<xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
The number of parameters in the collection must equal the number of parameter placeholders within the command text, or else the .NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC raises an error.
trans-unit.target: 集合中的參數數目必須等於命令文字內的參數預留位置的數目，否則 ODBC 的.NET Framework 資料提供者會引發錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcParameter"></xref> to the <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcParameterCollection"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcParameter"></xref> to add to the collection.
The index of the new <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcParameter"></xref> object.
The specified in the value parameter is already added to this or another .
trans-unit.target: 中所指定 value 參數已加入至這個或另一個 。

trans-unit.source: The value parameter is null.
Adds the specified <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcParameter"></xref> object to the <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcParameterCollection"></xref>.
A <xref:System.Object>.
The index of the new <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcParameter"></xref> object in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 新的索引<xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcParameter"></xref>集合中的物件。

trans-unit.source: Adds an <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcParameter"></xref> to the <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcParameterCollection"></xref>, given the parameter name and data type.
trans-unit.target: 新增<xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcParameter"></xref>至<xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcParameterCollection"> </xref>，給定的參數名稱和資料類型。

trans-unit.source: The name of the parameter.
One of the <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcType"></xref> values.
The index of the new <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcParameter"></xref> object.
Adds an <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcParameter"></xref> to the <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcParameterCollection"></xref> given the parameter name and value.
trans-unit.target: 新增<xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcParameter"></xref>至<xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcParameterCollection"></xref>給定的參數名稱和值。

trans-unit.source: Use caution when using this overload of the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcParameterCollection.Add%2A> method to specify integer parameter values.
trans-unit.target: 請謹慎使用這個多載的<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcParameterCollection.Add%2A>方法，以指定整數參數值。</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcParameterCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: Because this overload takes a `value` of type <xref:System.Object>, you must convert the integer value to an <xref:System.Object> type when the value is zero, as the following C# example demonstrates.
trans-unit.target: 因為此多載會採用`value`型別的<xref:System.Object>，您必須將整數值轉換<xref:System.Object>時輸入的值為零，如下列 C# 範例所示。</xref:System.Object> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: ``` parameters.Add("@pname", Convert.ToInt32(0)); ``` If you do not perform this conversion, the compiler will assume you are attempting to call the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcParameterCollection.Add%2A?displayProperty=fullName> overload.
trans-unit.target: ``` parameters.Add("@pname", Convert.ToInt32(0)); ```如果您不會執行這項轉換，編譯器會假設您正在嘗試呼叫<xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcParameterCollection.Add%2A?displayProperty=fullName>多載。</xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcParameterCollection.Add%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.target: 新增<xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcParameter"></xref>至<xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcParameterCollection"> </xref>、 指定的參數名稱、 資料類型和資料行長度。

One of the <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcType"></xref> values.
The length of the column.
The index of the new <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcParameter"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether an <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcParameter"></xref> object with the specified parameter name exists in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否<xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcParameter"></xref>物件集合中存在具有指定的參數名稱。

trans-unit.source: Copies all the elements of the current <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcParameterCollection"></xref> to the specified one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> starting at the specified destination <xref:System.Array> index.
trans-unit.target: 目前的所有項目複製<xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcParameterCollection"></xref>於指定的一維<xref:System.Array>開始於指定的目的地<xref:System.Array>索引。</xref:System.Array> </xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> that is the destination of the elements copied from the current <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcParameterCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 一維<xref:System.Array>，是從目前的複製之元素的目的地<xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcParameterCollection"> </xref>。</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit integer that represents the index in the <xref:System.Array> at which copying starts.
trans-unit.target: 32 位元的整數，表示在索引<xref:System.Array>在複製開始的位置。</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: Copies all the elements of the current <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcParameterCollection"></xref> to the specified <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcParameterCollection"></xref> starting at the specified destination index.
trans-unit.target: 目前的所有項目複製<xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcParameterCollection"></xref>指定<xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcParameterCollection"></xref>開始於指定的目的索引。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit integer that represents the index in the <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcParameterCollection"></xref> at which copying starts.
trans-unit.target: 32 位元的整數，表示在索引<xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcParameterCollection"></xref>在複製開始的位置。

trans-unit.source: Returns an Integer that contains the number of elements in the <xref href="System.Data.Odbc.OdbcParameterCollection"></xref>.
